# System Windows Forms Docs

- [CalculateBackgroundImageRectangle method](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/additional-apis/system-windows-forms/calculatebackgroundimagerectangle-method.md): Learn more about the CalculateBackgroundImageRectangle method

- [StringCollectionEditor class](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/additional-apis/system-windows-forms/stringcollectioneditor-class.md): Learn more about the StringCollectionEditor class
- [UpdateStylesCore method](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/additional-apis/system-windows-forms/updatestylescore-method.md): Learn more about the UpdateStylesCore method
